transform_sql_select: SELECT TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1, 2)) AS record_type_code, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3, 5)) AS schema_version ,TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(TRIM(SUBSTRING(bill_data_str, 8, 8)),' ',TRIM(SUBSTRING(bill_data_str, 16, 9))),'yyyyMMdd HHmmssSSS') AS file_creation_dt_time ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 25, 32)) AS file_batch_id ,reverse(split(input_file_name(), '/'))[0] AS file_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 57, 32)) AS claim_administrator_unique_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 89, 32)) AS claim_administrator_ofc_unique_id FROM jopari_file_header_record_01_vw

SELECT f.file_header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1,2)) AS record_type_code ,CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,6)), '') AS INT) AS num_of_bills_in_batch ,CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 9,6)), '') AS INT) AS num_of_bill_lines_in_batch ,CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 15,12)) ||'.'|| TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 27,2)), '.') AS DECIMAL(14,2)) AS dollar_amount_billed  FROM jopari_file_trailer_record_90_vw JOIN db_jopari_file_header_record_01_vw f

SELECT f.file_header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1,2)) AS record_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15)) AS unique_bill_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 18,4)) AS bill_form_type ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 22,2)) AS claim_type ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 24,32)) AS submitter_bill_id_num ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 56,32)) AS ocr_image_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 88,32)) AS billing_prov_unique_bill_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 120,80)) AS patient_last_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 200,25)) AS patient_middle_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 225,25)) AS patient_first_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 250,15)) AS patient_last_name_suffix ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 265,80)) AS patient_address1 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 345,80)) AS patient_address2 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 425,60)) AS patient_city ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 485,2)) AS patient_state_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 487,9)) AS patient_postal_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 496,2)) AS patient_country_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 498,15)) AS patient_phone_num ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 513,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS patient_dob ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 521,1)) AS patient_gender_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 522,1)) AS patient_marital_status_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 523,2)) AS patient_employement_status ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 525,1)) AS patient_student_status ,IF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 526,9)) REGEXP '^0+$', NULL, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 526,9))) AS patient_SSN,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 535,80)) AS employer_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 615,32)) AS indexed_claim_num ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 647,32)) AS reported_claim_num ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 679,32)) AS patient_account_num ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 711,32)) AS patient_medical_record_num ,CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 743,14)), '') AS BIGINT) AS total_charge_per_bill ,CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 757,14)), '') AS BIGINT) AS outside_lab_charges ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 771,2)) AS accident_cause1 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 773,2)) AS accident_cause2 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 775,2)) AS accident_cause3 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 777,2)) AS accident_state ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 779,2)) AS facility_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 781,1)) AS bill_frequency_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 782,2)) AS bill_submission_reason_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 784,15)) AS original_reference_num ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 799,1)) AS provider_signature_on_file_ind ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 800,1)) AS provider_accepts_assignment ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 801,1)) AS assignment_of_benefits_ind ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 802,1)) AS patient_signature_source_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 803,2)) AS contract_type_code ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 805,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS from_service_bill_date ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 813,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS thru_service_bill_date ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 821,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS date_of_bill ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 829,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS date_bill_received_by_payer ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 837,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS date_of_injury ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 845,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS date_of_onset_similar_symptoms ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 853,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS prescription_bill_date ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 861,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS disability_begin_date ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 869,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS diability_end_date ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 877,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS admission_date ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 885,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS discharge_date ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 893,4)) AS bill_class_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 897,16)) AS payer_assigned_pay_code FROM jopari_bill_header_record_10_vw JOIN db_jopari_file_header_record_01_vw f

SELECT b.bill_header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1,2)) AS record_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15)) AS unique_bill_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 18,120)) AS billing_provider_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 138,80)) AS billing_provider_address1 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 218,80)) AS billing_provider_address2 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 298,60)) AS billing_provider_city pay_to_provider_state ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 794,9)) AS pay_to_zip_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 803,2)) AS pay_to_provider_country ,NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 805,9)), '') AS sender_pay_to_provider_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 886,120)) AS service_facility_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1006,80)) AS service_facility_address1 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1086,80)) AS service_facility_address2 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1166,60)) AS service_facility_city ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1226,2)) AS service_facility_state ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1228,9)) AS service_facility_zip_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1237,2)) AS service_facility_country ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1239,30)) AS service_facility_provider_state_license ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,1269,10)) AS service_facility_provider_NPI  FROM jopari_bill_provider_record_12_vw  LEFT JOIN db_jopari_bill_header_record_10_vw b ON TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15))=b.unique_bill_id

SELECT b.bill_header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1,2)) AS record_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15)) AS unique_bill_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 18,1)) AS priority tin_type ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 467, 9)) AS tin ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 476, 1)) AS release_of_info_code ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 477, 8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 545, 60)) AS plan_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 605, 120)) AS payer_name ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,725, 80)) AS payer_address1 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,805, 80)) AS jopari_subscriber_record_13_vw JOIN db_jopari_bill_header_record_10_vw b ON TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15))=b.unique_bill_id

SELECT b.bill_header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1,2)) AS record_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15)) AS unique_bill_id ,CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 18,6)), '') AS INT) AS line_number ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 24,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS service_from_date ,TO_DATE(NULLIF(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 32,8)),'00000000'),''),'yyyyMMdd') AS service_thru_date , TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 40,2)) AS procedure_code_qualifier, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 42,8)) AS procedure_code, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 50,2)) AS hcpcs_modifier_code_1, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 52,2)) AS hcpcs_modifier_code_2, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 54,2)) AS hcpcs_modifier_code_3, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 56,2)) AS hcpcs_modifier_code_4, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 58,80)) AS procedure_description, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 138,4)) AS revenue_code, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 142,2)) AS place_of_service_code, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 144,2)) AS type_of_service_code, CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 146,1)), '') AS INT) AS diagnosis_pointer_1 , CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 147,1)), '') AS INT) AS diagnosis_pointer_2, CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 148,1)), '') AS INT) AS diagnosis_pointer_3 , CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 149,1)), '') AS INT) AS diagnosis_pointer_4, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 150,2)) AS day_unit_code , CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 152,5))||'.'||TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,157,1)), '.') AS DECIMAL(6,1))AS day_unit_qty, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 158,32)) AS prior_authorization , CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 190,8)) ||'.'||TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,198,2)), '.') AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS revenue_unit_rate, CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 200,8)) ||'.'||TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,208,2)), '.') AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS total_charge_per_line , CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 210,4))||'.'||TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,214,2)), '.') AS DECIMAL(6,2)) AS sales_tax FROM jopari_bill_detail_record_50_vw JOIN db_jopari_bill_header_record_10_vw b ON TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15))=b.unique_bill_id

AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS dme_purchase_price, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 71,1)) AS dme_rental_billing_freq FROM jopari_bill_detail_additional_dme_data_52_vw JOIN db_jopari_bill_header_record_10_vw b ON TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15))=b.unique_bill_id

SELECT b.bill_header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1,2)) AS record_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15)) AS unique_bill_id ,CAST(NULLIF(TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 18,6)), '') AS INT) AS line_num ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 24,3)) AS oral_cavity_designation_code1 ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 27,3)) AS oral_cavity_designation_code2,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,30,3)) AS oral_cavity_designation_code3 , TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,33,3)) AS oral_cavity_designation_code4, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,36,3)) AS oral_cavity_designation_code5, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 39,1)) AS prosthesis_crown_inlay_code, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 61,8)) AS tooth_info FROM jopari_bill_detail_additional_ada_data_53_vw JOIN db_jopari_bill_header_record_10_vw b ON TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15))=b.unique_bill_id

SELECT b.bill_header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 1,2)) AS record_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15)) AS unique_bill_id ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 18,2)) AS admission_hour ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 20,2)) AS admission_type_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 22, 2)) AS admission_source_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str,24,2)) AS discharge_hour ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 26, 2)) AS discharge_status_code ,TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 28,3)) AS drg_code ,SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 31, 102) AS procedure_codes ,SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 133,80) AS occurance_codes ,SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 213, 72) AS occurance_span_codes ,SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 285,22) AS condition_codes ,SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 307,144) AS value_codes,SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 451,114) AS icd10_procedure_codes FROM jopari_institutional_record_31_vw JOIN db_jopari_bill_header_record_10_vw b ON TRIM(SUBSTR(bill_data_str, 3,15))=b.unique_bill_id
